metadata.description: In the daytime, he’s an honor student, but at night, the fascinating Maya appears. College student Kazuya is strongly attracted to Shinya, but doesn’t accept his split personality.  Meanwhile a politician named Tanabe is manipulating Shinya, and Wagaki finds out!  This is a hot mystery love story by Kanbe and Shima! Don’t miss it!
metadata.name: HOT LIMIT (Yaoi Manga)
